name: Song Hop 2
description:
Immersed in the world of music, Song Hop has the latest music along with unique game play. Try to bounce the Music man through the music tunnel and avoid to fall out the rhythm tiles
Let's play the music and feeling the beats

Each dance is a rhythm, bringing true musical feelings to you
Show your accuracy skill

Friendly control and simple game play
Updated with the top-hit soundtrack, music content
Features updated weekly
Enhanced with friendly design
